product_name: The North Face Surgent Pants - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Surgent Pants are stellar warm-up or cool-down pants designed with technical, jersey-face fleece fabric for maximum comfort and temperature regulation during aerobic activities. 100% polyester fleece fabric provide UPF 50 sun protection; antimicrobial treatment helps resist odors. Easy on/off elastic waistband with drawstring provides precise fit. Slash hand pockets; stash pocket in the waistband. The North Face Surgent Pants have a relaxed fit.
short_description: The North Face Surgent Pants are stellar warm-up or cool-down pants designed with technical, jersey-face fleece fabric for maximum comfort and temperature regulation during aerobic activities.
